attributes.action: STOP funding the White Helmets & stop accepting funding from Saudi Arabia.
attributes.additional_details: This video from the UN Peace Council clearly states what is happening in Syria and talks about the White Helmets & Saudi Arabia. The White Helmets claim they are neutral yet they have been filmed carrying guns & participating in terrorist videos of beheading. Saudi Arabia funding is introducing a radical form of Islam, Wahabism into our education system.
